# seconds

**Instance Property**

A representation of the time in seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
var seconds: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

If the time is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleTimingInfo/invalid] or [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTimeFlags/indefinite], the value equals [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Double/nan].

## Inspecting a Time

- **hasBeenRounded**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system rounded the time.
- **isValid**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a time is valid.
- **isNumeric**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a time is numeric.
- **isIndefinite**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a time is indefinite.
- **isPositiveInfinity**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a time represents positive infinity.
- **isNegativeInfinity**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a time represents negative infinity.
